column1: }}'''Tindómiel''' was the second child, and only daughter, of [[Elros
column2: Elros Tar-Minyatur]], the first [[King of Númenor]]. Almost nothing is known about her life.<ref>{{UT

column1: Her name means "Morning Star" in [[Quenya]] (an assimilation of ''[[tindómë]]'' = "twilight of dawn" and ''[[elen
It can also be taken as "daughter of twilight", with ''[[-iel]]'' being a feminine suffix. In that case, it is a cognate of ''[[Tinúviel]]''.
